title: Small Pets Okay! Extremely Affordable One Bedroom! Sheridan Red Line!
posting_body: Call Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for Reference #1325370.
Affordable one bedroom in Buena Park/North Lakeview!
This small  dog friendly apartment has a spacious layout and is located in a well-kept courtyard building in the heart of Buena Park!
Lake Michigan, Wrigley Field, groceries, nightlife, restaurants and Target are all within walking distance.
The 36 and 151 bus lines and the Sheridan Red Line El train stop are steps away.
Laundry is conveniently located in the building.
Heat and cooking gas are included in the rent!
Pics may not be of the exact unit.
***Photos may be of a similar unit.***For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #1325370
